00040 #include "input.h"
00041 
00042 #include "graphics/graphics.h"
00043 #include "interface/interfacemanager.h"
00044 
00045 #include <SDL.h>
00046 #include <algorithm>
00047 
00048 namespace ST
00049 {
00050         void InputManager::getEvents()
00051         {
00052                 SDL_Event event;
00053                 while (SDL_PollEvent(&event))
00054                 {
00055                     AG_ProcessEvent(&event);
00056 
00057                         switch (event.type)
00058                         {
00059             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00060                 {
00061                     interfaceManager->handleMouseEvent(event.button.button,
00062                                                        event.button.x, event.button.y,
00063                                                        0);
00064                 } break;
00065             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00066                 {
00067                     interfaceManager->handleMouseEvent(event.button.button,
00068                                                        event.button.x, event.button.y,
00069                                                        1);
00070                 } break;
00071                         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00072                                 {
00073                                         keysDown.push_back(event.key.keysym.sym);
00074                                 } break;
00075                         case SDL_QUIT:
00076                                 {
00077                                         // fake escape being pressed
00078                                         keysDown.push_back(SDLK_ESCAPE);
00079                                 } break;
00080                         }
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00084         bool InputManager::getKey(SDLKey key)
00085         {
00086                 std::list<SDLKey>::iterator itr;
00087                 itr = std::find(keysDown.begin(), keysDown.end(), key);
00088                 if (itr != keysDown.end())
00089                 {
00090                         keysDown.erase(itr);
00091                         return true;
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 return false;
00095         }
00096 }
